reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Airport Hotel Linate in mid July, 2004. Although the hotel has a pleasant, modern lobby and dining area, the sleeping rooms are small, boxlike, hot and airless. We were assured that the air conditioning was working, but the temperature in our room hovered around 80 degrees until late in the night when it dropped to the mid 70’s. It was difficult for us to understand why the hotel has been given a 4 star rating!
reviews.title: Bad Choice of Hotel
Hated the service if you can call it that
reviews.text: This hotel needs to give their staff a lesson in manners.Upon arrival the receptionist was too busy taking private telephone calls to bother with the fact that a guest had just arrived.The rooms were worthy of a 1 star hotel in Calcutta, there was not even curtains to protect from the sunlight and we should probably forget the fact that the hotel is on a main street.The traffic was a constant nightmare and at 03.00 am I called to change rooms as I could not sleep, after 5 minutes calling (and recieving no answer) I gave up.The management need to have a good look at themselves and ask themselves if they should really be doing this work as they obviously Know nothing about the hotel trade.IF YOU NEED TO GO TO MILAN FIND ANOTHER HOTEL...
This was the most horryfing hotel experience I have ever had.
reviews.title: I am still traumatised.

reviews.text: Initially I booked Straf in the centre of Milan but had to cancel as I had a flight out of Milan next day at 7am. In order to make the flight I needed to be at Linate Airport at 5am for check-in. I made the hard decision and decided to stay near the airport.
reviews.title: Good Resting Place

reviews.text: I went into my room in Air Hotel and stood spellboud for quite some time. Everything was unclean and I did not take my heels off because the carpet looked disgusting. I peeled the covers so I will not need to sit on them only to discover somone's luggage stickers on the sheets.
reviews.title: Average business hotel

reviews.text: I was looking though my bag for a camera charger when someone swiped their card at my door and barged in - it was the cleaning lady. After that I made sure all my luggage was locked before I headed out to explore Milan.
reviews.title: TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I returned there was a rave 50 meters from the hotel. After the rave some of its atendees stayed at the hotel. As you can guess, they had a room next to me. They made noise, kept knocking at my door.. etc
reviews.title: A good sleep near Linate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed one night in may 2007...very close to airport and didn't hear any noise after normal sleeping time. Staff helpful, but room heat couldn't be lowered. Had an excellent meal in dining room. don't expect to use pool on Sunday--closed.
reviews.title: very nice
Good accomodation
reviews.text: On the down side the room/decor was outdated, the food was overpriced and there was no hot water.

reviews.title: Good accomodation better than expected
reviews.text: On the plus side it is near the airport, there is a shuttle and it is a convenient business hotel.

The Air Hotel is very good and comfortable to stay for those who visit Milan for the Fair, because it is very close to Linate Airport and there is a regular shuttle bus to go from the Airport to the new Fiera at Rho Pero
reviews.title: Hell reborn
